resources.string:
Hi there, my name is Santiago 
 
I am really excited to learn about mobile development. 
To prove this, I will post a really nice part from the script of a movie I love, Ratatouille:

For Chef Gusteau\'s famous motto, \"Anyone can cook.\" \nBut I realize only now do I truly understand what he meant. \nNot everyone can become a great artist,but a great artist can come from anywhere...
